import React from "react"; import address from "../image/OutlayAddress.png"; import campaigns from "../image/OutlayrCampaigns.png"; // import outlayr3 from "../image/OutlayrCampaignSquare.png"; // import outlayr4 from "../image/OutlayrCommentsWide.png"; // import outlayr5 from "../image/OutlayrRatingWide.png"; // import joesdough1 from "../image/JoesDough1.png"; // import joesdough2 from "../image/JoesDough2.png"; // import joesdough3 from "../image/JoesDough2Full.png"; // import joesdough4 from "../image/JoesDough3Full.png"; // import personal1 from "../image/personalFull.jpg"; // import personal2 from "../image/personal_project2.png"; // import personal3 from "../image/personal_project3.png"; // import personal4 from "../image/personalFull1.jpg"; class MyWork extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { console.log("hello"); let textOverImage = document.querySelectorAll(".details"); for (let i = 0; i < textOverImage.length; i++) { textOverImage[i].onclick = function() { console.log(this.classList); this.classList.toggle("show"); }; } } render() { return (

My Work

Here is a dashboard of my previous projects. Click on the pictures to see more information!

Chat Preview and Message Board

Developed both the Message Board and Chat Preview Components allowing for a more user-friendly chatting experience.

  • The message board displays all the users and the content of the most recent message. When clicked, it will route you to the conversation with the user that was clicked.
  • The chat preview uses the information from the URL posted (using Regular expressions), and makes an Axios call(s) in order to get the image, title and description of the product. Once clicked, it will route you to the checkout page to order the product.
{/*

Comments and Ratings

Implemented comments and rating component allowing to add reviews to the product.

  • Engineered logic so edit and delete buttons show if you are the user that posted the comment
  • Authored logic so user can rate the product once.

Discount Dropdown in Campaign

Improved Campaign Component allowing users to navigate through the application easier.

  • Added discount dropdown that depending on the product selected, it will show the discounts associated with the product through writing complex stored procedure/algorithm in T-SQL and React.
  • Updated Campaign Component by linking tables in T-Sql and writing queries to show product/discount names instead of corresponding Ids.

Topping and Pizza Display Page

  • Structured the data of Topping and Pizza entities in seperate tables and connected through a compositite table with pizza id and topping id. I made the two id into foreign keys.
  • In order to get the pizza with all the necessary toppings, I wrote a stored procedure that made two select queries wrapped in a transaction statment -- one getting all the pizza and one getting all pizza id and topping id from the composite table. Through C#, I stitched the result set using IDictionary interface and displayed the approprate information.{" "} See Code Here
  • Implemented Edit and Delete functionality.

Adding Toppings

  • A modal appears with the available toppings to add to the pizza.
  • The done button is disabled if no topping is added.

Adding Toppings

  • Once the topping is added, the topping is removed from the dropdown.
  • Using CSS animation the topping is shown on the pizza.

Home Page

An Application that simplifies the adopting process. Brings many adoption platform into one single app!

  • Application is built using React, .Net Core, T-SQL, AWS S3, Axios, Pet Finder API, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

Pet Finder Third Party API and Webscrapping

  • Implemented Pet Finder Third party API that allows users to navigate to Pet Finder's page if they find a pet they want to adopt using Rest Sharp.{" "} See Code Here
  • Webscrapped another Pet Agency's web page in order to display pets avaiable on their website using Angle Sharp.{" "} See Code Here

Pet Form with Validation

  • Designed customized form validation without using third party libraries.
  • Created an responsive UI/UX design letting users know which inputs are missing. Customized Messages depending on validation error.
*/}
); } } export default MyWork;
